items.text:
5:00 AM

Start from Sun City Apartments, Bangalore.

5:00 AM - 8:30 AM

Drive to Hogenakkal Falls. Choose one of two routes:

  • Option 1: Via Thenkanikottai View driving directions. Last known good rest stop with toilet facility at IndianOil pump.

    Pros:

    • 120km, 3hrs 20 min.
    • More scenic route with lush greenery.

    Cons:

    • Roads can be narrower and may have more curves.
    • Fewer options for restaurants and amenities.
  • Option 2: Via Rayakottai-Palacode View driving directions. Last known good rest stop at IndianOil.

    Pros:

    • Wider and better-maintained roads (mostly highways).
    • More options for food and rest stops along the way.

    Cons:

    • 142km, 3hrs 35min.
    • Less scenic compared to the Thenkanikottai route.

9:00 AM - 12:00 PM

Explore Hogenakkal Falls. Enjoy a coracle ride (check availability and safety), see the waterfalls.

2:00 PM

Leave for The Royal Honeychilk Palace and check in. View on map. View driving directions

Evening

Relax at the hotel and have dinner.

Morning

Enjoy breakfast at the hotel. You can explore the nearby village or take a short walk.

11:00 AM

Check out from the hotel and start your drive back to Bangalore. View driving directions

On the way

You can stop for lunch at a restaurant on the highway.

5:00 PM

Arrive at Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.
